description: Try our easy to follow Chelsea Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chelsea Buns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To prepare icing, sift icing mixture into a bowl. Add butter and milk and stir until combined and smooth. Add drops of food colouring to reach desired colour. Drizzle icing over buns and serve.
